title: 怎么换皮肤
author: 袁少Gent
txt_content: 怎么换皮肤...求大佬解释嘤嘤嘤

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
安装这个 mod
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-269807-1-1.html

然后来这里上传皮肤 https://littleskin.cn/
